roleset.name: care for someone's dog while they're away
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on SMS. Relation to 'babysit', 'housesit'.

example.name: arg0
example.text: *PRO* Dogsitting next door . person coming around 6 to pick up one dog . then dog walk sometime after that , but no later than 7 . lots of cleaning to do bc people coming back tmrw .
